email_text.subject: Manual Payment Notification
email_text.body:
A manual payment needs to be processed for the conference {$schedConfName} and the user {$userFullName} (username "{$userName}").
The item being paid for is "{$itemName}". The cost is {$itemCost} ({$itemCurrencyCode}).
This email was generated by Open Conference Systems' Manual Payment plugin.
email_text.description: This email template is used to notify a conference's registration contact that a manual payment was requested.
